channel.title: Hubway on Tejas Rawal
channel.description: Recent content in Hubway on Tejas Rawal

item.title: HUBWAY DATA EXERCISE
item.description: 1 Network Visualisation : Node-link Ride Network of Nodes 7, 8 and 9 The network has 3 sub networks of Nodes 7, 8 and 9 connected with their respective rides edges. A simple representation. smpl <- graph.data.frame(Hubway1) igraph.options(layout=layout.kamada.kawai, vertex.label = NA, vertex.size = 5, vertex.frame.color = "blue", vertex.color = "lightblue") plot(smpl, edge.arrow.size=0.1) 2 Network Visualisation : Node-link (Normalised) Ride Network of Nodes 7, 8 and 9 Same as above, the network has 3 sub networks, with the normalised values.
